title: Pipedrive: Create or update organization
description: Update an organization in Pipedrive or create it if they do not exist yet.

organizationIdentifier.description: Identifier used to find existing organization in Pipedrive. Typically this is the name but it can also be a custom field value.

organization.description: The organization to be created or the fields to be updated. Custom organization fields may be included by using the long hash keys of the custom fields. These look like "33595c732cd7a027c458ea115a48a7f8a254fa86".

add_time.description: If the organization is created, use this timestamp as the creation timestamp. Format: YYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS
